data.introduce: PNR结构化信息提取(RTL)服务通过主机RT指令查询主机CRS系统中的PNR记录，提供简单有效的实时查询通道，提取指定PNR号的结构化记录信息。
data.business: 对应主机RT指令，提取PNR记录（RTL）信息。
data.functions:
对应主机RT指令，提取PNR记录信息
提供开放的结构化数据
数据实时准确
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"OTA_AirResRetRtlRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"提取PNR信息请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"？：？","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"伪城市代码（Office代码：PKE099）","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"BookingReferenceID","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号信息","children":[{"name":"@ID","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"PNR号","children":[]}]}]}]
